$WmMPID_セシリア,ch02_09_Secilia_F_Normal,Face|Roy and Lilina, I know it's been
a while, but it's time for a special
lesson.$k$p$WmMPID_ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Normal,Face|It is my duty as a leader to become
a symbol for the people and lead
our forces to victory.$k$p$WmMPID_リリーナ,ch02_03_Lilina_F_Normal,Face|If Ostia is to have a future, I, too,
must unite my people. I will follow
Roy's example!$k$p
